entry.p: I've been so busy lately that I forgot to mention that I'll be interviewed on FLOSS Weekly later today (to be exact, at 22:00 UTC, i.e. T-4 hours). You can listen live at twit.am and send me questions in the jdev@conference.jabber.org chatroom. :)
UPDATE: The podcast has been posted at http://twit.tv/floss49!
